#Run (from command line) model simulations using parameter sets generated by the inference scheme 

#ARGS input listing
# ARG 1: ParamInputFile
# ARG 2: SeedRunID
# ARG 3: TotalRunNum
# ARG 4: SeasonsToSimulate (from 2009/10 season onwards; 9 corresponds to 2009/10-2017/18, 8 to 2009/10-2016/17 etc)
# ARG 5: SimnRunType (Flag variable. Values correspond to: 1 - exploratory; 2 - historical; 3 - forward simulations)
# ARG 6: VaccEffTestFlag (Declare if vaccine efficacy varies per simulation run, or fixed for all
#   					-> 0: Fixed for all
#						-> 1: In forward simulated seasons, randomly sampled each run;
#						-> 2: In forward simulated seasons, take max vacc efficacies from 2010-2018 period)
# ARG 7: MultiSeasonImmFlag (Declare if immunity may be propoagetd for more than a single season
#   					-> 0: No, 1: Yes)

#Evaluating model fits - Empirical data

## Four season fit
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/FourSeasonFitData/ParameterSets_FourSeasonFit.txt" 1 1000 7 2 0 0

## Five season fit
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/FiveSeasonFitData/ParameterSets_FiveSeasonFit.txt" 2 1000 8 2 0 0

## Six season fit
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/SixSeasonFitData/ParameterSets_SixSeasonFit.txt" 3 1000 9 2 0 0

## Six season fit - Extended Model
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/SixSeasonFitData/ExtendedModel_ParameterSets_SixSeasonFit.txt" 4 1000 9 2 0 1

#Evaluating model fits - Synth data

## Original model
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/SynthFitData/ParameterSets_SynthDataFit.txt" 5 1000 9 2 0 0

## Extended Model
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/SynthFitData/ExtendedModel_ParameterSets_SynthDataFit.txt" 6 1000 9 2 0 1

#Forward projections
Set SeasonsToSimulate to 21 to perform runs from 2009/10-2029/30.

## Randomly sampled vaccine efficacy
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/SixSeasonFitData/ParameterSets_SixSeasonFit.txt" 7 1000 21 3 1 0

## Fixed at maximum vaccine efficacy
julia PredModelSimn.jl "../../Results/ParamInference/SixSeasonFitData/ParameterSets_SixSeasonFit.txt" 8 1 21 3 2 0
